main event: A sighting of strange patterns on a television set was reported, which the observer interpreted as various forms of flying saucers.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on April 7, 1964, early in the evening,The object was described as cigar-shaped and capable of quick changes in brightness and mobility,The observer assumed the patterns were caused by flying saucers, but concluded that electronic interference was the likely cause, The report involved a 12-year-old son of the observer, who both witnessed the event together, A letter from the USAF suggested that external electrical interference was responsible for the observed patterns.
witness description: An adult and a 12-year-old boy observing from a rural area
